page.title: 19Primary Schools - Paignton
page.content:
{A day in my life at Hayes Road School}
I start my day by waking up and reading. Then I get dressed and go downstairs to breakfast of cornflakes and toast. Then I do my teeth and go to school. At school when in class I read until twenty past nine then we do maths until prayers. We sing "Who built the Ark?" then we go out to play. After play we do some writing until dinner time. After dinner we do P.E. and sometimes we do art and craft. After storytime I go home. Sometimes I go up to my friends house to play then go home for tea of chips, sausages and beans. Finally I watch the television before going to bed.
